title: FS: NEW Large Lot of Lower Grade T206

posts.post_title: FS: NEW Large Lot of Lower Grade T206
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T206 cards for sale or trade. These are lower grade cards as the scans will show, but nearly all of them present well for the technical grade. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

CARDS PICTURED (removing **SOLD** cards for easier viewing):

Beck - $28
